text: Tim Civeja (born 4 January 2002) is an Albanian footballer who plays as a central midfielder for club 1. FC Saarbrücken. ==Club career== Civeja played in his youth for TaF Glonntal, before joining the academy of FC Augsburg in 2015. He made his professional debut for Augsburg's first team in the Bundesliga on 16 January 2021, coming on as a substitute in the 87th minute for Rani Khedira against Werder Bremen. The away match finished as a 0–2 loss. ==International career== Civeja has appeared for the Germany under-18 and under-19 national teams. ==Personal life== Civeja was born in Dachau, Bavaria, and is of Albanian descent. His father is from Berat and his mother is from Kuçovë. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian footballers Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Augsburg players
title: Tim Civeja
